headline: McLean & Company Reveals Full Agenda for Signature 2025, the Firm's Conference Helping HR Leaders Build Human-Centric, Future Ready Organizations
summary: Leading HR research and advisory firm McLean & Company has announced the complete agenda for its flagship conference, Signature 2025, taking place November 2-4 at the Marriott Marquis in Houston, Texas. With the bold theme "Human-Centric, Future-Ready," this year's event will convene HR executives, practitioners, and thought leaders for three days of research-driven insights, immersive sessions, and peer exchange at one of North America's most impactful HR gatherings.

content.title: McLean & Company Reveals Full Agenda for Signature 2025, the Firm's Conference Helping HR Leaders Build Human-Centric, Future Ready Organizations
content.summary: Leading HR research and advisory firm McLean & Company has announced the complete agenda for its flagship conference, Signature 2025, taking place November 2-4 at the Marriott Marquis in Houston, Texas. With the bold theme "Human-Centric, Future-Ready," this year's event will convene HR executives, practitioners, and thought leaders for three days of research-driven insights, immersive sessions, and peer exchange at one of North America's most impactful HR gatherings.

thumbnail.caption: McLean Signature 2025, the premier event for future-focused HR professionals, will take place November 2-4, 2025, at the Marriott Marquis Houston. This year’s theme, “Human-Centric, Future-Ready," will unite HR leaders from around the world to explore innovation, culture, and the evolving role of people in the age of AI. (CNW Group/McLean & Company)
